name: DNSRegistrar
description: An ENS registrar that allows the owner of a DNS name to claim the corresponding name in ENS.

eventDecorators.name: Claim
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

eventDecorators.name: NewOracle
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

eventDecorators.name: NewPublicSuffixList
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

functionDecorators.name: claim
functionDecorators.description: Claims a name by proving ownership of its DNS equivalent.

parameterDecorators.name: name
parameterDecorators.description: The name to claim, in DNS wire format.

parameterDecorators.name: proof
parameterDecorators.description: A DNS RRSet proving ownership of the name. Must be verified in the DNSSEC oracle before calling. This RRSET must contain a TXT record for '_ens.' + name, with the value 'a=0x...'. Ownership of the name will be transferred to the address specified in the TXT record.

functionDecorators.name: proveAndClaim
functionDecorators.description: Submits proofs to the DNSSEC oracle, then claims a name using those proofs.

parameterDecorators.name: name
parameterDecorators.description: The name to claim, in DNS wire format.

parameterDecorators.name: input
parameterDecorators.description: The data to be passed to the Oracle's `submitProofs` function. The last proof must be the TXT record required by the registrar.

parameterDecorators.name: proof
parameterDecorators.description: The proof record for the first element in input.
